constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 152 (Wednesday, September 21, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. JOHNSON of Georgia:
H.R. 8936.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to Article I, section 8,
clause 9 and Article I, section 8, clause 18 of the United
States Constitution.
[Page H8066]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet.

title: Circuit Court Judgeships Act of 2022
